title: what item could be made to kill tanks, but not abused to kill squishies?
body:
This is a dilemma, what item would carries be able to buy without fear of bruisers abusing to kill them? 

This is directly related to the Mrazor post, but I am more concerned with this issue... not necessarily the Mrasor itself

My suggestion? Create an item that does exponential damage based on the amount of defensive stats of the target.

For example:
Atma's Harpoon:
Builds from pickaxe, vamp cept, and longsword

+70 AD
+12-15% vamp
Active: for the next 5-10 seconds AAs deal (true damage?)  equal to 50*(armor/100 + mr/75  + hp/1,500) of the enemy being attacked.

Maybe that is a bit overly complicated, but I would like to see other people pitch their ideas
